events.text: The communist regime in Romania is now falling apart after a set of violent demonstration in major cities over food shortages
The military just had an amazing public hanging in Bukarest today! Everybody was there to see when the dictator gets the wage he deserves for his treatment of his kids
No, it's too scary for me. But a friend of me was there and there was a big cheer when the gallow opened and the leader struggled to his death
I see. We have not eaten for two weeks.... Shortages everywhere of course.

Good Evening January 1st, 1990! We've just got terrific reports the just collapsed regime  has left thousands of children in hundreds of shoddy orphanages across Romania who are living under extreme harsh conditions
We've just confirmed these pictures are real and the pictures we seen are upsetting, showing babies covered in their own faeces
At least, we hoped to get a new Romania after this...
